meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of dipsomania.
meanings.sent1: Her dipsomaniacal behavior at the party was quite noticeable.
meanings.sent2: He had a dipsomaniacal love for whiskey, often drinking more than he should.
meanings.sent3: The dipsomaniacal squirrel kept stealing all the fermented berries from the garden.
meanings.sent4: The dipsomaniacal storm flooded the town with a deluge of rain.
meanings.sent5: The dipsomaniacal sunset painted the sky in hues of red and gold.

meanings.definition: Given to or marked by excessive drinking of alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent1: The dipsomaniacal man stumbled out of the bar, clearly intoxicated.
meanings.sent2: Her dipsomaniacal tendencies often led to embarrassing situations.
meanings.sent3: The dipsomaniacal penguin had a bit too much fish-flavored vodka.
meanings.sent4: The dipsomaniacal river flowed with a constant stream of beer bottles.
meanings.sent5: The dipsomaniacal partygoers danced wildly under the disco ball.
